snippet: EFG-Hermes, struggling in a volatile market, is scrambling to sell a large piece of its business to a smaller rival in Qatar.
abstract: EFG-Hermes, struggling in a volatile market, is scrambling to sell a large piece of its business to a smaller rival in Qatar.

byline.original: By STANLEY REED and SARA HAMDAN

headline.main: Egypt's Disarray Puts a Regional Investment Bank in Play
headline.print_headline: Egypt’s Disarray Puts a Leading Regional Investment Bank in Play
